answer: The current work extends existing theories on massless fields and helicity representations by considering the covariant, spinor sets of relativistic wave equations for a massless field, as seen in hep-th/0101190.
explanation: This paper provides a universal description of the states with integer and half-integer helicity, and also discusses the infinite-dimensional representations corresponding to massless states with fractional helicity.
